casebody.data:
Kevin K. McALEENAN, Acting Secretary of Homeland Security, et al., petitioners,
v.
Martin Jonathan Batalla VIDAL, et al. No. 18-589. Supreme Court of the United States June 28, 2019.

Petition for writ of certiorari in No. 18-587 granted. Petition for writ of certiorari before judgment in No. 18-588 and No. 18-589 granted. The case is consolidated, and a total of one hour is allotted for oral argument.
